trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""> </xref> az esemény a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property gets a new instance of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>tulajdonság lekérdezi egy új példányt a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>enumerálása során egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>vagy egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>egy esemény jelenik meg.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the current state of the audio input using the `AudioState` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Ezt úgy szerezheti be a hang használó bemeneti jelenlegi állapotában a `AudioState` tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>osztályok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new state of audio input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A felismerő való hangbemenetet új állapotának beolvasása.

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property contains one of three values from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: A AudioState tulajdonság a következő három érték egyikét tartalmazza a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>számbavételi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of audio input after a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hangbemenetet után állapotát a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"> </xref> vagy egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"> </xref> egy esemény jelenik meg.
